title: I seriously want to thank riot for...
body:
I've been permabanned twice. Both were major losses, as I added up the amount of money I spent buying riot points, it came out to just a little above $14,000. On my first account I had almost every skin in the game. The second account I was almost caught back up to how many skins my first had.

...yeah I know. I'm an idiot with no self control.

That's why this feature is perfect for me! I don't even have the ability to chat anymore. I can't be toxic! My only problem was flaming and arguing with people, now that I can't do that, I am able to enjoy the game! God I wish they added this sooner (or I found out about it sooner, I have no idea how long it's been in the game) it would have saved me a ton of time, money, and months of depression I went through after losing those accounts :P haha. Sorry just had to get this off my chest. I am so happy I am able to enjoy league for what it is without losing all my time and money put into the game

**_ANYWAY_**

Seriously I mean this from the bottom of my heart, whoever thought of this idea, you're amazing!! Thank you so much!! (:

but fucking 14k??? what the hell is your problem? even if you own every skin and every event pass, that doesnt add up to 14k. so that means you must also be buying every sticker/emote and ward skin and most likely also chests to gamble for fun.

EVEN IF YOU CAN EFFORT IT you have a problem and should get help. like thats not healthy man. (gambling) addiction is a serious problem

...yeah I know. I'm an idiot with no self control.

I'm a firm believer in not worrying about what other people are doing with their time or money, but I'm also a firm believer in recognizing and getting help for self-destructive behaviors. So unless the amount you've spent on League is such a small amount of your income that it doesn't even matter, you need to be at a therapist yesterday, my dude.
